title: Brain-controlled robotic hand enhanced by sensory feedback
text:
Brain-controlled robotic hand enhanced by sensory feedback Monday, January 29, 2018 - 01:33 
Scientists from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (EPFL) are developing a hand exoskeleton controlled by brainwaves which they say enhances performance of brain-machine interfaces.   
Scientists from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (EPFL) are developing a hand exoskeleton controlled by brainwaves which they say enhances performance of brain-machine interfaces.  //reut.rs/2noc5Rp
